PROPERTY_LOCATION.NAME: Base Address
PROPERTY_LOCATION.DESCRIPTION: This base address is the OCP base address used by SW to program OCP

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Function Type
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The input probe port to watch

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Probe
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The input probe port to watch

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Enabled Group 0
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for setting enabled group 0 initiators

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Enabled Group 1
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for setting enabled group 1 initiators

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Enabled Group 2
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for setting enabled group 2 initiators

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Enabled Group 3
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Options for setting enabled group 3 initiators

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Enabled Value
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The above domain(s) which matche(s) the selected value with defined masked bit will be enabled.

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Mask Filter
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The above domain(s) which matche(s) the selected value with defined masked bit will be enabled.

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Enabled Value
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The above access types(s) which matche(s) the selected value with defined masked bit will be enabled.

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Mask Filter
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The above access type(s) which matche(s) the selected value with defined masked bit will be enabled.

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Use Addresses Trigger
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: The option of using defined two address to enable watch-point or trigger EMU0/EMU1

PROPERTY_LOCATION.NAME: Start Location
PROPERTY_LOCATION.DESCRIPTION: Reference value of start program address

PROPERTY_LOCATION.NAME: End Location
PROPERTY_LOCATION.DESCRIPTION: Reference value of end program address

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Trigger Type
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The option of setting trace trigger

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Trigger-out EMU0
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The option of setting output trigger for EMU0

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Trigger-out EMU1
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: The option of setting output trigger for EMU1

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Use EMU Trigger
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: The option of using EMU0/EMU1 signal to trigger watch-point

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Start on EMU0
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Start watch-point on EMU0 high to low trigger

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Stop on EMU1
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Stop watch-point on EMU1 high to low trigger

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Data Flag Mapping
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Option for mapping data type to the flags in the message. Docoder will use the flag to showing data information.

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Flag 0
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Option for mapping data types to flag 0 in the message

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Flag 1
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Option for mapping data types to flag 1 in the message

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Flag 2
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Option for mapping data types to flag 2 in the message

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Flag 3
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Option for mapping data types to flag 3 in the message

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Flag 4
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Option for mapping data types to flag 4 in the message

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Flag 5
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Option for mapping data types to flag 5 in the message

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Flag 6
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Option for mapping data types to flag 6 in the message

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: Flag 7
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Option for mapping data types to flag 7 in the message

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: obs_drma0
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Option for enabling control module event 0

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: obs_drma1
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Option for enabling control module event 1

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: mail1_u0_irq
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Option for enabling control module event 2

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: mail1_u1_irq
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Option for enabling control module event 3

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: mail1_u2_irq
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Option for enabling control module event 4

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: mail1_u3_irq
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Option for enabling control module event 5

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: mail2_u0_irq
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Option for enabling control module event 6

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: mail2_u1_irq
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Option for enabling control module event 7

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: mail2_u2_irq
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Option for enabling control module event 8

PROPERTY_STRING.NAME: mail2_u3_irq
PROPERTY_STRING.DESCRIPTION: Option for enabling control module event 9

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Use EMU Trigger
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: The option of using EMU0/EMU1 signal to trigger watch-point

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Start on EMU0
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Start system event detection on EMU0 trigger

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Stop on EMU1
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Stop system event detection on EMU1 trigger

PROPERTY_INTEGER.NAME: Sampling Window
PROPERTY_INTEGER.DESCRIPTION: The clock cycles window for eliminating repeating event detection

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Time Stamp
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: Include Time Stamp in the DMA profiling data

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Trace MDataLast
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: MDataLast is traced to flag burst completion

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Trace MDataByteEn
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: MDataByteEn is traced for each in-burst write data

PROPERTY_BOOL.NAME: Trace SResp
PROPERTY_BOOL.DESCRIPTION: SResp is traced for each in-burst read data
